dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
This survey gathers data on local law enforcement in North Carolina.

Variables include salaries, fringe benefits, manpower strength, special units, departmental activities, calls for service, number of investigations, internal operations, and equipment and facilities.

publication.publicationCitation: North Carolina Law Enforcement Data. Raleigh, N.C. : Criminal Justice System Planning and Evaluation Office, Governor's Crime Commission, 1980?

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Self administered questionnaire to local law enforcement agencies (police or sheriff departments) in North Carolina.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I;
